Description.div: Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: DriverDate
Attribute.Description: Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

This flag determines whether an hold has been placed on the order when certain hold types criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

This flag indicates whether the expiration date is a system recommended date or whether it is already determined for the buyer. The value is Y if expiration date is system recommended. This flag only applies to Quotes.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrder
Attribute.Description: Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: SourcingClassification
Attribute.Description: This attribute will be used to determine node for sourcing.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order.

Description.div: Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action = DELETE will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AvailableQtyForStopDelivery
Attribute.Description: The quantity avialable through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.

Description.div:
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: HasServiceLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.

Attribute.Name: IntentionalBackorder
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: RemainingQty
Attribute.Description: Remaining quantity.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonLongDesc
Attribute.Description: Long description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonShortDesc
Attribute.Description: Short description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order line.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted.

Attribute.Name: CreditWOReceipt
Attribute.Description: Indicates if credit has been issued upon receipt of the returned goods.

Attribute.Name: IsReturnable
Attribute.Description: Is the line returnable.

Attribute.Name: ReturnWindow
Attribute.Description: Number of days within which the item must be returned for it to be accepted as a return on the system.

Description.div: Contains information about order line pricing and quantity details.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: PrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Attribute.Name: RequestedAuthAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedRefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.

Description.div: Most attributes of the ChargeTransactionDetails element are not template driven. If the element is present in the template, these attributes will be output, regardless of their presence or absence in the template. Template controlled attributes will be noted below.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalExpectedAuthorizations
Attribute.Description: Total authorizations postponed until the order nears release to node.

Attribute.Name: FundsRequiredOnOrder
Attribute.Description: The FundsRequiredOnOrder represents the amount not yet authorized on the order minus the authorization possible on each PaymentMethod. PaymentMethods marked UnlimitedCharges = Y will be counted as having an authorization limit of 0. PaymentMethod marked as Charge upto Available with MaxChargeLimit = 0 will also be counted as 0 and not as the complete funds from YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit on the PaymenMethod as we do for RemainingAmountToAuth. This attribute value will be Zero if there are sufficient funds or excess funds on the order. FundsRequiredOnOrder gives a picture on MaxChargeLimit to be adjusted on the orders PaymentMethods This attribute is template controlled.

Attribute.Name: RemainingAmountToAuth
Attribute.Description: The remaining amount of authorization planning needed for the order. This attribute represents the amount not yet authorized on the order minus the authorization possible on each PaymentMethod . PaymentMethod s marked UnlimitedCharges = Y will be counted as having a limit of 0. This attribute may be negative if there are extra credits or authorizations on the order. This attribute is template controlled.

Attribute.Name: TotalCredits
Attribute.Description: Total Credits

Attribute.Name: TotalDebits
Attribute.Description: Total Debits

Attribute.Name: TotalOpenAuthorizations
Attribute.Description: Total Open Authorizations

Attribute.Name: TotalOpenBookings
Attribute.Description: Total Open Bookings

Attribute.Name: TotalTransferredIn
Attribute.Description: Total amount of funds transferred in from other orders.

Attribute.Name: TotalTransferredOut
Attribute.Description: Total amount of funds transferred out to other orders.

Attribute.Name: TransactionDate
Attribute.Description: Transaction Date.

Attribute.Name: AuthAvs
Attribute.Description: AVS Authorization code.

Attribute.Name: RequestId
Attribute.Description: Authorization request Id.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: PrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Attribute.Name: RequestedAuthAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedRefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.

Description.div: The order to which these funds were transferred. This information is only valid for charge transactions where ChargeType is TRANSFER_OUT

Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: DriverDate
Attribute.Description: Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.

This flag determines whether a hold has been placed on the order when certain hold type criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the scheduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Non-Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Description.div: The total amount of charges applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of discounts applied on the order and lines.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the entire order.

Attribute.Name: GrandShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the entire order.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied on the order and lines.
The total amount of charges applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of discounts applied directly to the order header.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping for the order header only.

Attribute.Name: HdrShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges for the order header only.

Description.div: The total amount of taxes applied directly to the order header.
The total amount of the order excluding line totals.
The line sub total for this order. This is the sum of each line's ExtendedPrice.
The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines / (Order Total - Sum of Manual Charges on Order and Lines)

The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ( (Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation) - (Sum of Item Cost across all lines))/(Extended Price of all items on the order + charges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+Charges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned.

Attribute.Name: RecurringAdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all Non-Informational and Recurring Additional Line Prices for the Order.

Element.Description: Represents the total charges and discounts on the order for the specified ChargeCategory and ChargeName.

Attribute.Name: ChargeCategory
Attribute.Description: The charge category for the OverallChargeTotal.

Attribute.Name: ChargeName
Attribute.Description: The charge name for the OverallChargeTotal.

Attribute.Name: GrandCharges
Attribute.Description: The total charges on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.

Attribute.Name: GrandDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total discounts on the order for the ChargeCategory - ChargeName combination.

Attribute.Name: IsManual
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine.

Attribute.Name: IsShippingCharge
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N.

Attribute.Name: GrandCharges
Attribute.Description: Grand Charges

Attribute.Name: GrandDiscount
Attribute.Description: Grand Discount

Attribute.Name: GrandTax
Attribute.Description: Grand Tax

Attribute.Name: GrandTotal
Attribute.Description: Grand Total

Attribute.Name: HdrCharges
Attribute.Description: Header Charges

Attribute.Name: HdrDiscount
Attribute.Description: Header Discount

Attribute.Name: HdrTax
Attribute.Description: Header Tax

Attribute.Name: HdrTotal
Attribute.Description: Header Total

Attribute.Name: LineSubTotal
Attribute.Description: Line Sub Total

Description.div: Contains information about the price and total amount details that are not invoiced for the order.

Attribute.Name: GrandCharges
Attribute.Description: Grand Charges

Attribute.Name: GrandDiscount
Attribute.Description: Grand Discount

Attribute.Name: GrandTax
Attribute.Description: Grand Tax

Attribute.Name: GrandTotal
Attribute.Description: Grand Total

Attribute.Description: Header Charges

Attribute.Name: HdrDiscount
Attribute.Description: Header Discount

Attribute.Name: HdrTax
Attribute.Description: Header Tax

Attribute.Name: HdrTotal
Attribute.Description: Header Total

Attribute.Name: LineSubTotal
Attribute.Description: Line Sub Total

Element.Description: A return order for which this exchange order was created. This information is only valid for exchange orders.

Indicates if the billing, shiping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.

or
N

Attribute.Name: RefundAmountWithAssignments
Attribute.Description: Amount of the total refund that has been assigned.

Attribute.Name: RefundAmountWithoutAssignments
Attribute.Description: Amount of the total refund that has not been assigned to a payment.

Attribute.Name: TotalAmountToBeRefunded
Attribute.Description: The total amount to be refunded in this transaction.

Attribute.Name: TotalTransferredOut
Attribute.Description: The total amount that has been transfered to a different order.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingAuthInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total authorization amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: The total charge amount that has not been sent to the payment processing system for processing yet.

Attribute.Name: DisplayPrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate display value of the primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit, if it was invoked. If the order is created for a customer and the payment method is a valid customer payment method, it indicates the amount available for the customer account. If customer account is not maintained internally or if the MaxChargeLimit is not set on the customer payment method, this value is returned as 0.
Indicates if the YFSGetFundsAvailableUE user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: PrimaryAccountNo
Attribute.Description: The appropriate primary identifier of this PaymentType, depending upon the PaymentTypeGroup.

Attribute.Name: RefundAmount
Attribute.Description: Amount to be refunded to this payment.

Attribute.Name: RequestedAuthAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of authorizations sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of charges sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method.

Attribute.Name: RequestedRefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The total amount of refunds sent to an external system and still awaiting response on this payment method. This number will be positive. This total will no longer be included in the RequestedChargeAmount, but if an asynchronous refund is submitted in excess of this amount, the RequestedChargeAmount will be reduced for backwards compatibility.

Element.Description: The PaymentMethod that the above RefundPaymentMethod is created for.

Attribute.Name: RefundAmount
Attribute.Description: The amount from this payment method that is being refunded.

Element.Description: The fulfillment details for this refund payment method. This will be presented when the refund payment requires refund fulfillment.
